page.title: 11ECONOMICS.
page.content: Ilfracombe has four banks, Lloyds, Midland, Barclays and Natwest. Also four Building Societies,these are the Alliance, Anglia, Bristol and West and West of England. All are in the High Street.The average number of staff for the banks in the summer is sixteen in the winter is fourteen. The average number of staff for a Building Society is about ten. In the summer the banks hold more than five hundred thousand pounds each week and about one hundred thousand pounds in the winter.The busiest time of the year is the summer because Ilfracombe is a holiday resort and the influx of tourists brings more money to the area. The busiest days are Mondays and Fridays. Mondays, because businesses pay in their weekend takings and Fridays because people draw out money for the weekend.
